snippet.title: David Slade Mysteries: Case Files - Definitive Edition - Official Trailer | Upload VR Showcase 2023
snippet.description: Prepare to uncover the truth about your sister's mysterious death in David Slade Mysteries: Case Files. Explore the dark streets of Riverside and collect evidence using your forensic toolkit. David Slade Mysteries: Case Files - Definitive Edition is a police quest-inspired VR thriller series, out now on Meta Quest 2, Pico 4, and Steam VR. It's also coming to Pimax Portal and Crystal soon. This trailer also reveals that Case Files 2: The Riverside Slasher is currently in development.
